scripts.install:all: npm run install:master && npm run install:child-app-1 && npm run install:child-app-2
scripts.serve:all: concurrently "npm run serve:master" "npm run serve:child-app-1" "npm run serve:child-app-2"
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build:master" "npm run build:child-app-1" "npm run build:child-app-2"
